metadata.inclusion:
1. Plug the Siren into a power socket
2. The LED indicator will flash twice
3. Press the Test Button 3 times within 1.5 seconds
4. The Siren will emit 1 long beep and LED will flash once if successful
metadata.exclusion: Press the Test Button 3 times within 1.5 seconds. The Siren will be removed from the Z-Wave network.
metadata.reset: Press and hold the Test Button for ~10 seconds until the LED starts to flash twice. The siren will emit 2 short beeps.
